text: I think now you probably know enough in order to book yourself into a hotel room.

OK. I want you to start by saying, I would like a room for two people for two nights.
Je voudrais une chambre pour deux personnes pour deux nuits.

J'ai une chambre pour deux personnes avec douche.

Cent euros.

Euro.

If you do pronounce it in an English way, you will be understood, obviously, particularly in the context.
But do get some practice saying that.

S'il vous plaît.
